entry.title: F2Pool has enabled full replace-by-fee
entry.summary: Chun Wang expressed his recognition of a problem and informed that they will switch to FSS RBF soon. Peter Todd, responding to Chun's email, mentioned that he prefers full-RBF but either one is a step forward for Bitcoin. He also provided his phone number in case of any issues. The email contained a non-text attachment, a digital signature with a URL.
